Subject: Amperion vs. Savior
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 111
From: Rudra656@...

::Amperion::
    "I don't think I like you very much."  He transforms into his more 
impressive robot mode and stares directly into Savior's eyes.  He growls and 
forces the blades he stole from Amp out of his arms.  He reaches behind him 
drawing his two short swords that use his saber teeth for hilts.  His eyes 
glowed showing that he was able to emit beams from them.  "Now draw or leave. 
 I care not which you choose."
